summary: From Gun Control to Migration Harry Styles' $1.2m Donation Makes Statement on US Society
title: From Gun Control to Migration Harry Styles' $1.2m Donation Makes Statement on US Society
body:
In a world where authenticity is a prized asset celebrities often find a challenge to provide it as they are directed towards supporting uncontroversial global charities. Harry Styles has bucked the trend however by announcing his support of a series of local organisations and, in the midst of that cohort of charities, making some deep statements about his views on American society. By engaging with gun control, work place harassment and migration issues, he is quietly setting a stall out on 2018’s major issues of US society and politics.

At first glance you think that if you are looking to spend $1.2m on making a difference in the world, the last thing you want to do is to spread it across tens of partners, geographies and causes. Everyone already worries that celebrities are over-managed in their philanthropy, that they give to ‘safe’ brand-name organisations that they know will manage their media well rather than anyone they actually care about. They tend to have one international charity, one kids’ charity and one cancer charity, see them each once a year and be done with it.

So when Harry Styles splits his money between a massive fifty-nine different organisations, some would see him as fulfilling the worst of celebrity behaviour. In fact, what he’s doing is both bucking a trend to support big organisations over local and creating a mixture of engagements that allow him to include gifts that show his views on issues he clearly cares about.

With consistent themes around health and nutrition and education and young people well-covered there are a number of commitment to charities that celebrities would rarely be drawn to or publicly donate to. Supporting March For Our Lives in Washington, D.C. to build cross-party consensus around an end to gun violence is a long way from the normalcy of celebrity philanthropy. This of course is not his first statement on the matter having drawn attention for decorating his guitar with stickers against gun violence during a 2018 gig in Dallas, Texas.

A further donation goes to The International Institute of Minnesota which describes itself as delivering “services and resources to assist New Americans in the transition to a new life leading to economic self-sufficiency” which is not usual celebrity territory by any means.

Meanwhile choosing to fund Time’s Up - a Los Angeles charity supporting people to fight sexual harassment in the work place - feels like a message to his own industry given both timing and location.

What looks like the philanthropic selection of someone who just can’t decide is in fact Styles managing to back smaller organisations that often get overlooked and advance a socio-political agenda he clearly has a passion for. Maybe in doing so, he’s found a route to authenticity after all.

FORBES

summary: Can you pleaseee make one where he gets overwhelmed with how good Y/N feels when they’re fucking and like goes into headspace...
question: Can you pleaseee make one where he gets overwhelmed with how good Y/N feels when they’re fucking and like goes into headspace and fucks her really hard? And she has to use their safe word because it hurts her some and she became overwhelmed? Thanks you !!! <3
answer:
“Holy shit,” he cusses, causing a soft chuckle to leave your lips along with a moan, the intense burning sensation of your walls stretching around his big cock being something you’ve never tried before, at least not this intense.

Harry had warned you that he was big, a cocky smirk spread across his face, while pointing out that it wasn’t to pat his own back or anything, but he had been right; he was indeed bigger than any guy you had ever been with before.

“Fuck, you feel so good,” he mumbles as he places sloppy kisses on your neck, your fingertips digging into the plushy skin of his broad shoulders, just needing a moment to adjust to his size - but Harry doesn’t let you.

He quickly starts moving, his hips starting in a slow rocking pace, but he picks up the pace, the smalls thrusts becoming faster and harder. “H-Harry,” you stutter, trying to get his attention, just needing him to slow down for a second.

A loud growl leave his lips, his breath hot on your skin as he bites down on the lobe of your ear, his moans and groans filling the room. But he’s too lost in his own thoughts to hear you, his mind foggy and the overwhelming feeling washing over him, as he never imagined that you would feel this good. 

The force of his thrusts causes the mattress to move beneath you as you whimper, the burning feeling you had gotten when he entered you only getting worse. “Harry,” you try again, but the lump in your throat makes your voice too quiet, his own moans too dominant for him to hear you. 

You squeeze your eyes shut to hold the tears back, your core almost feeling like it’s on fire as you keep trying to get his attention, your fingers digging harder into his shoulder blades, but it only makes him moan even louder.

The feeling of your slick and wet walls stretching around him, have made Harry loose his mind completely; he’s waited so long to feel you wrapped around him. His grip on your hips tightens as he picks up the pace of his thrusts, the sound of your skin slapping against each other filling the room along with his moans. 

It’s only when he hear the word leave your lips, when he realises that he’s lost it and gone too far. It catches him off guard, never having expected to actually use it, but you had insisted on getting a safe word, which he was thankful for now. 

“Oh my god,” he says as he pulls his face away from your neck, his thumb quickly catching the tear that’s rolling down your cheek, as he’s completely frozen on the spot. “Holy shit, I’m so so sorry,” he apologises, his own eyes getting glossy as he never wanted to be the one to hurt you. 

“I just lost it, completely forgot to take it slow,” his hand softly cups your cheek, his thumb carefully stroking your tearstained cheek as he fights the lump that’s building up in his throat. “I didn’t mean to hurt you baby,” he whispers, quietly begging for you to open your eyes to look at him; he needs to know that you’re okay.

And when you finally open your eyes, his heart breaks, seeing your red glossy eyes looking up at him, the hurt clear in your eyes. “I’m so sorry,” he whispers as he looks down at you, his thumb gently wiping away another tear. 

“‘S okay,” you mumble with a shaky breath, never having meant to cry like this, but it just hurt too bad for you to hold back. “No it’s not,” he fights, his lips leaving a delicate kiss to your flushed cheek, his eyes filled with regret. 

“Let’s just take a break, yeah?” he murmurs, earning a little nod from you as you sniffle, just needing a moment to make the tears go away. “And then we can try again and I promise I’ll be gentle, we’ll take it just at your pace. Maybe you on top this time, mm?” he suggests; secretly promising himself then and there that he’ll never be the reason for your tears again.

“Fuck, you feel so good,” he mumbles as he places sloppy kisses on your neck, your fingertips digging into the plushy skin of his broad shoulders, just needing a moment to adjust to his size - but Harry doesn’t let you.

He quickly starts moving, his hips starting in a slow rocking pace, but he picks up the pace, the smalls thrusts becoming faster and harder. “H-Harry,” you stutter, trying to get his attention, just needing him to slow down for a second.

A loud growl leave his lips, his breath hot on your skin as he bites down on the lobe of your ear, his moans and groans filling the room. But he’s too lost in his own thoughts to hear you, his mind foggy and the overwhelming feeling washing over him, as he never imagined that you would feel this good. 

The force of his thrusts causes the mattress to move beneath you as you whimper, the burning feeling you had gotten when he entered you only getting worse. “Harry,” you try again, but the lump in your throat makes your voice too quiet, his own moans too dominant for him to hear you. 

You squeeze your eyes shut to hold the tears back, your core almost feeling like it’s on fire as you keep trying to get his attention, your fingers digging harder into his shoulder blades, but it only makes him moan even louder.

The feeling of your slick and wet walls stretching around him, have made Harry loose his mind completely; he’s waited so long to feel you wrapped around him. His grip on your hips tightens as he picks up the pace of his thrusts, the sound of your skin slapping against each other filling the room along with his moans. 

It’s only when he hear the word leave your lips, when he realises that he’s lost it and gone too far. It catches him off guard, never having expected to actually use it, but you had insisted on getting a safe word, which he was thankful for now. 

“Oh my god,” he says as he pulls his face away from your neck, his thumb quickly catching the tear that’s rolling down your cheek, as he’s completely frozen on the spot. “Holy shit, I’m so so sorry,” he apologises, his own eyes getting glossy as he never wanted to be the one to hurt you. 

“I just lost it, completely forgot to take it slow,” his hand softly cups your cheek, his thumb carefully stroking your tearstained cheek as he fights the lump that’s building up in his throat. “I didn’t mean to hurt you baby,” he whispers, quietly begging for you to open your eyes to look at him; he needs to know that you’re okay.

And when you finally open your eyes, his heart breaks, seeing your red glossy eyes looking up at him, the hurt clear in your eyes. “I’m so sorry,” he whispers as he looks down at you, his thumb gently wiping away another tear. 

“‘S okay,” you mumble with a shaky breath, never having meant to cry like this, but it just hurt too bad for you to hold back. “No it’s not,” he fights, his lips leaving a delicate kiss to your flushed cheek, his eyes filled with regret. 

“Let’s just take a break, yeah?” he murmurs, earning a little nod from you as you sniffle, just needing a moment to make the tears go away. “And then we can try again and I promise I’ll be gentle, we’ll take it just at your pace. Maybe you on top this time, mm?” he suggests; secretly promising himself then and there that he’ll never be the reason for your tears again.

summary: I'm a young woman. I am intelligent and reasonable. I am cynical, sarcastic and realistic. I am taken seriously and I'm very...
body:
I’m a young woman. I am intelligent and reasonable. I am cynical, sarcastic and realistic. I am taken seriously and I’m very ambitious. And I can proudly say that One Direction is one of the most amazing bands on this planet and that Harry Styles means the world to me. Because he was able to reach me and touch me with his music and his words when nobody else could.

I will never stop loving this band.

summary: hiii I don't mean to be rude or anything, but do you know when you'll post the next chapter of my prince? I'm really excited for...
question: hiii I don't mean to be rude or anything, but do you know when you'll post the next chapter of my prince? I'm really excited for the next part!
answer:
hi, anon! no, not rude at all :) I’ve been a bit busy with my dissertation and planning my last travels for the summer, so I haven’t been writing much but I hope to change that.

At this time, I don’t have a specific date for the next chapter, but I hope to get it out soon. I’m so glad you’re liking My Prince! xx
